Back to Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

Suite, KV 399/385i

c. 1782 · KV1,2 399 · KV3,6 385i

[IMSLP]

Total duration: 11'

  • 1. Ouverture
  • 2. Allemande
  • 3. Courante
  • 4. Sarabande

Mozart only completed the first three movements of the suite. Five and a half bars of the sarabande are all that exist of the remaining movements.

Recommended editions

  • Neue Mozart-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · IX/27/2 · BA 4584-02 · Klavierstücke / Band 2: Einzelstücke · ed. Wolfgang Plath
  • Associated Board · Mature Piano Pieces · ed. Richard Jones
  • Bärenreiter · BA 5745 · Einzelstücke für Klavier · ed. Wolfgang Plath
  • Henle · HN 22 · Klavierstücke · ed. Ullrich Scheideler
  • Henle · HN 23 · Klavierstücke · ed. Ullrich Scheideler
  • Henle · HN 133 · Klavierstücke / Auswahl · ed. Ullrich Scheideler [not including mov. 4]
  • Könemann · K 113 · Klavierstücke · ed. István Máriássy [not including mov. 4]
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50230 · Klavierstücke / Band 2: Spätere Werke · ed. Ulrich Leisinger [with completion to mov. 4 by Robert Levin]

1. Ouverture

Duration: 4'

Difficulty: 3.5

2. Allemande

Duration: 4'

Difficulty: 2.5

3. Courante

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 3

4. Sarabande

This movement is incomplete.

Duration: 0' 30"

Difficulty: 1.5
